responsibleParties.organisationName: NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies USA

description: GISS-E2-H is the NASA GISS atmospheric model (version E2) combined with the HYCOM Ocean model. It can be run with 3 different treatments of the atmospheric composition. With "physics-version=1", the aerosols and chemistry are read in from offline fields. For "physics-version=2" and "physics-version=3", the aerosols and gas phase chemistry are interactive with the climate and driven by emissions. The Aerosol Indirect Effect is parameterized in p1 and p2 to have a specific forcing at year 2000, while in p3, the AIE is prognostic.

responsibleParties.organisationName: NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies USA

subComponents.description:
Depending on physics_version this code may or may not be used.
physics_version=1  It is NOT used (aerosol mass is read in instead from offline, decadally varying fields)
physics_version=2  It is used. AIE is parameterised
physics_version=3  It is used. AIE is calculated prognostically
